title: S12 Ep168: Haunted Minds: The Ghostbox Sessions
itunes:title: Haunted Minds: The Ghostbox Sessions
description:
Anthony Sanchez is the Writer, Director, and Producer of this new documentary that is shot on location in California, Nevada and Colorado, GHOSTHUNTERAPPS Media visits some of the most haunted locations known to the paranormal community. Anthony joins Beyond the Darkness to talk about the making of the film and the equipment used in the film.

Free Movie Site: http://ghosthunterapps.com/HauntedMindsMovie.html

Anthony F. Sanchez's UFO Book: http://ufohighway.com/
